players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Charlie's death is tragic. We need to share observations carefully. I have no special info, just a villager trying to find the mafioso among us."
Diana: "Charlie's death is a huge loss. As a villager, I'm looking for any inconsistencies in behavior. Bob, you seem quick to declare your role - why?"
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. We must vote her out."
Diana: "Alice, that's a desperate lie. If you were the detective, why wait to reveal until after I questioned Bob? You're trying to frame me to save yourself or the real mafioso."
Bob: "Alice, if you're the detective, why didn't you reveal this immediately? Diana's questioning of me was normal town behavior. This timing feels opportunistic."
